common.GenericException: Sorry, something went wrong. Please contact your site administrator.
common.LimitExceededException: Attempt limit exceeded, please try again after some time.
common.InvalidUsernameException: Spaces are not permitted in usernames or email addresses.
common.genericError: An unexpected error has occurred when loading ForwoodID. Please refresh your browser and try again
common.copyright: Copyright © {{year}} Forwood Enterprises. All rights reserved
common.versionNotificationText: A newer version of Forwood ID has been released. Please refresh your browser to ensure you have the latest updates.
common.disabledService: This service is not currently enabled
common.noPermissionService: You are not currently permitted to use this service. Please contact your site administrator

login.signInFederated: If you have a network account:
login.federatedButtonText: Click here to use single sign on (SSO Login)
login.UsernameEmptyException: Email or username field is required.
login.PasswordRequirenmentMessage: Your password must contain at least 8 characters and include at least one upper case character, one lowercase character, one number, and one special character.
login.NotAuthorizedToGetAuthDetails: We are sorry, you are not permitted to login using a Forwood account. Please use the SSO login link.
login.AccountDisabledException: Your account is disabled. Please contact your site administrator.
login.TemporaryPasswordExpired: Your temporary password has expired. Please contact your site administrator.
login.GenericAuthException: Sorry, something went wrong. Please contact your site administrator.
login.attemptsExceeded: Too many failed attempts. Please try again after several minutes.
login.forwoodIdAccountNotFound: While you have successfully authenticated, you do not currently have an account for this platform. Please ask your site administrator to give you access.
login.ssoNotEnabledForIdAccount: While you have successfully authenticated, SSO login is not enabled for the ForwoodID account that is linked with your email address. Please ask your site administrator to enable SSO login for your account.
login.accountNotPermittedWithIdentityProvider: While you have successfully authenticated, you do not have permission to access ForwoodID with this SSO identity provider.
login.identityProviderNotSupported: You have attempted to use an unsupported SSO identity provider. Please contact your site administrator

forgotPassword.UnverifiedEmailException: Sorry, cannot reset password because there is no verified email for this account.
forgotPassword.NotAuthorizedException: Sorry, you must first go 'Back to Login' and login with your assigned temporary password.
forgotPassword.NotAuthorizedGivenTheCurrentUserState: Sorry, you must first go 'Back to Login' and login with your assigned temporary password. Users with a network account, contact your site administrator if you forgot your password.
forgotPassword.CodeEmptyException: Code is required. Please enter the code which was sent to your email address.
forgotPassword.CodeMismatchException: Invalid code provided, please try again.
forgotPassword.InvalidPasswordException: Invalid password provided. Your password must contain at least 8 characters and include at least one upper case character, one lowercase character, one number, and one special character.
forgotPassword.resetRequired: Your password has expired and must be changed. Please check your email for your reset code.
forgotPassword.resetSuccess: Your password has been updated successfully. Please log in using your new password.
forgotPassword.codeSent: A code has been sent to your email address
